name: Attuned_Scourging_Blast_A
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Corruptors and may be slotted into any Corruptor damage power.
